form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR VERIFICATION OF LAWFUL MANENT RESIDENCE AN ALIEN

full_text: UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE FORM APPROVED. IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE OMB NO. 43.RO368 DATE FILED FEE STAMP APPLICATION FOR VERIFICATION OF OF THE 1974 LAWFUL MANENT RESIDENCE CONSULATION UNITED GENERAL OF AMERICA, NO RECORD LOS AN ALIEN Files In COI in with immigrant visa application(s) of my FRC relative(s) listed in item 15 below, I request that the JUL 1 6 1974 Index American Consul at GuAdALA.,TAYA JAC MEX be furnished verification of my lawful admission into the United (City and Country abroad) MEXICO G360. States for permanent residence. I have read and fully understand the instruct spearing on the reverse of this form concerning the desirability of CHADALAJ attaching documentary evidence to prove relationship if the immigrant visa applicant is my parent, spouse, or unmarried child under the age of 21 years. 1. MY NAME IS (Last, in CAPS) (First) (Middle) 2 ALIEN REGISTRATION NUMBER IS MADRIGAL MA HIGINIA CORNETOA 34-618-343 3. THE PERSONS IN WHOSE BEHALF SUCH INFORMATION IS REQUESTED ARE AS FOLLOWS: FULL NAME Abundio COVNEJ CUEVAS DATE AND PLACE OF BIRTH 1913 JALOS TOTITLAN JALMAX RELATIONSHIP FATHER FULL NAME ADDRESS AVE dil Pargus #32 PLACE SAN Andres Good, MEX, DATE AND OF BIRTH MARIA BAEZ GALLEgOS SAN GASPAY JAL MEX 6-8-1918 RELATIONSHIP MOTHER AUE ADDRESS dtz PArquE # 32 SAN ANdrES Good MEX FULL NAME DATE AND PLACE OF BIRTH RELATIONSHIP ADDRESS NOT TO BE FILLED OUT BY APPLICANT 17 FULL SIGNATURE OF APPLICANT AS NOW LISED The Secretary of State is hereby informed that the applicant named above was wasnnot lawfully admitted for permanent residence. File does does not establish relationship between applicant herein and visa applicant.
